original_text: And David's two wives were taken captives, Ahinoam the Jezreelitess, and Abigail the wife of Nabal the Carmelite.
korean_text: (다윗의 두 아내 이스르엘 여인 아히노암과 갈멜 사람 나발의 아내였던 아비가일도 사로잡혔더라)

sentences.original_text: And David's two wives were taken captives
and Abigail the wife of Nabal the Carmelite
